allow: Bash(cmd /c "set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Eclipse Adoptium\jdk-17.0.17.10-hotspot && gradlew.bat test")
Bash(cmd /c "set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Eclipse Adoptium\jdk-17.0.17.10-hotspot && gradlew.bat assembleDebug")
Bash(cmd /c "set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Eclipse Adoptium\jdk-17.0.17.10-hotspot && set ANDROID_HOME=C:\Android\sdk && gradlew.bat assembleDebug")
Bash(cmd /c "set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Eclipse Adoptium\jdk-17.0.17.10-hotspot && set PATH=%JAVA_HOME%\bin;%PATH% && gradlew.bat assembleDebug")
Bash(cmd /c "set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Eclipse Adoptium\jdk-17.0.17.10-hotspot && set PATH=%JAVA_HOME%\bin;%PATH% && cd C:\Projects\steam-app && gradlew.bat :app:assembleDebug --console=plain")
Bash(cmd /c "set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Eclipse Adoptium\jdk-17.0.17.10-hotspot && set PATH=%JAVA_HOME%\bin;%PATH% && cd C:\Projects\steam-app && gradlew.bat assembleRelease")

Bash(cmd /c "set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Eclipse Adoptium\jdk-17.0.17.10-hotspot && set PATH=%JAVA_HOME%\bin;%PATH% && gradlew.bat assembleDebug 2>&1 | findstr /C:""BUILD"" /C:""error"" /C:""FAILURE""")

Bash(cmd /c "set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Eclipse Adoptium\jdk-17.0.17.10-hotspot && set PATH=%JAVA_HOME%\bin;%PATH% && cd C:\Projects\steam-app && gradlew.bat assembleDebug 2>&1 | findstr /C:"BUILD" /C:"error" /C:"FAILURE"")
Bash(cmd /c "set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Eclipse Adoptium\jdk-17.0.17.10-hotspot && set PATH=%JAVA_HOME%\bin;%PATH% && cd C:\Projects\steam-app && gradlew.bat assembleDebug")
Bash(cmd /c "set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Eclipse Adoptium\jdk-17.0.17.10-hotspot && set PATH=%JAVA_HOME%\bin;%PATH% && cd C:\Projects\steam-app && gradlew.bat clean assembleDebug --stacktrace")

Bash(cmd /c "set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Eclipse Adoptium\jdk-17.0.17.10-hotspot && set PATH=%JAVA_HOME%\bin;%PATH% && cd C:\Projects\steam-app && gradlew.bat assembleDebug --console=plain 2>&1 | findstr /V /C:"Daemon will be shut down" /C:"Daemon is shutting down" | findstr /C:"BUILD" /C:"FAILURE" /C:"error" /C:"Exception"")

Bash(cmd /c "set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Eclipse Adoptium\jdk-17.0.17.10-hotspot && set PATH=%JAVA_HOME%\bin;%PATH% && cd C:\Projects\steam-app && gradlew.bat :app:assembleDebug --console=plain 2>&1 | tail -50")
